title: FT T206 Tris Speaker Cycle 350 PSA 2.5 - sold

posts.post_title: FT T206 Tris Speaker Cycle 350 PSA 2.5 - sold
posts.post_content:
No longer need this awesome Speaker Cycle.  Looking for something I can swap into my collection instead.  Happy to balance cash on either side.  Looking for AB460s and big name HOF (HOF+backs even better).  PM or email [url]vettejayk@aol.com[/url]

Sold
